properties.areaDesc: Cleburne, AR; Conway, AR; Pope, AR; Perry, AR; Faulkner, AR; Pulaski, AR; Yell, AR; Van Buren, AR
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 10 at 10:11PM CST until January 10 at 11:15PM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Perry County in central Arkansas...
Southern Van Buren County in north central Arkansas...
Southwestern Cleburne County in north central Arkansas...
Faulkner County in central Arkansas...
Conway County in central Arkansas...
East central Yell County in central Arkansas...
Northwestern Pulaski County in central Arkansas...
Southeastern Pope County in central Arkansas...

* Until 1115 PM CST.

* At 1011 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from Claude to near Hattieville to near Petit Jean State
Park to 9 miles southeast of Ola, moving east at 30 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Conway...                         Heber Springs...
Morrilton...                      Perryville...
Greenbrier...                     Atkins...
Pottsville...                     Mayflower...
Greers Ferry...                   Wooster...
Oppelo...                         Quitman...
Guy...                            Damascus...
Twin Groves...                    Menifee...
Perry...                          Adona...
Houston...                        Bethlehem...

This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 89 and 133.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for central and
north central Arkansas.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread
significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately
likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of
a building. These storms may cause serious injury and significant
property damage.
